scriptsInfo.onlyTsFiles: Starts server in watch mode with automatic recompilation using ts-node-dev.
scriptsInfo.start: Starts the application using the compiled JavaScript file.
scriptsInfo.startDev: Starts the development environment using the startScript.sh shell script.
scriptsInfo.kill: Terminates the pm2 process manager along with all managed applications.
scriptsInfo.build: Compiles TypeScript code using the TypeScript compiler where path to the tsconfig is specified after the -p flag
scriptsInfo.monitor: Opens a monitoring interface for pm2-managed processes.
scriptsInfo.displayLogs: Displays the logs of pm2-managed applications.
scriptsInfo.runts: Runs the TypeScript file using ts-node.
